resources.string: is a contender for the Blue Lock Project and the protagonist of the spin-off, Blue Lock - Episode Nagi, who currently plays as a rightwing for England\'s Manshine City.\n When first arriving at Blue Lock, Nagi was a member of Team V and was the best player in his designated stratum.\n After the Blue Lock Eleven played against the Japan U-20 team, Nagi ranked as one of the top players in the project
